nodes.text: The Vosch Cluster was a location that contained numerous worlds. Having suffered from a lack of money, the economies of the worlds in the Vosch Cluster were severely hindered in the course of the Clone Wars. Galactic Republic senator Mon Mothma attempted to craft a relief bill for the Vosch worlds, but it was voted down.

Around the time of the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, a group of pirates blazed a hyperspace lane from the Vosch Cluster to the trade worlds around Caldra Prime and Caldra Tertius. A portion of the Rebel Alliance fleet that grouped between the Vosch Cluster and the trade worlds discovered the pirates, who threatened the safety of their rendezvous point. Rebel pilot Wedge Antilles presumed that the pirates had originated from the Vosch Cluster, and Mothma, then Chancellor in the Rebellion, was unsurprised due to the history of the Vosch worlds.
The Vosch Cluster was mentioned in the short story "Rendezvous Point," written by Jason Fry and published in From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back in 2020.
